targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "alloc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${pool}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "alloc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${pool}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "alloc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${pool}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket_long_term}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "alloc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${pool}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "size" or r["_field"] == "alloc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${pool}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(
        fn: (r) => ({
            _time: r._time,
            _measurement: r._measurement,
            _field: "pool_used_percent",
            _value: float(v: r.alloc) / float(v: r.size) * 100.0
        }),
    )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "free")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${pool}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "strings"

num_vdevs = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "fragmentation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "$pool")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => not strings.containsStr(v: r["vdev"], substr: "disk"))
  |> limit(n:1)
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> findColumn(
    fn: (key) => true, column: "_value"
  )

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "fragmentation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "$pool")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root/mirror-0" or r["vdev"] == "root/raidz-0" or (num_vdevs[0] == 1 and r["vdev"] == "root"))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.system.uptime.uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.truenas_arcstats.l2hit_p.l2hit" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.truenas_arcstats.l2miss_p.l2miss")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.system.load.load1" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.system.load.load5" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.system.load.load15")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.truenas_arcstats.size.size" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.truenas_meminfo.available.available" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.truenas_meminfo.total.total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_guest" or r["_field"] == "usage_system" or r["_field"] == "usage_user" or r["_field"] == "usage_nice" or r["_field"] == "usage_iowait" or r["_field"] == "usage_guest_nice" or r["_field"] == "usage_irq" or r["_field"] == "usage_softirq" or r["_field"] == "usage_steal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "date"
import "regexp"

truenas_drives = ["9JG4DJKT", "9JGK57NT", "9JH16J8T", "9JG2UX4G", "9JH158RT", "ZDHBCD6Y", "ZDHBDJS1"]
truenas_backup_drives = ["ZX213EF4", "ZX20SPDB", "ZDHBCJEL", "ZDHBCKH5"]

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d: 1m, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /^scale\.truenas\.smart_log_smart\.disktemp\..*/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with _field: regexp.findString(r: /[^\.]+$/, v: r._measurement)
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["_field"], set: truenas_drives) or contains(value: r["_field"], set: truenas_backup_drives))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "date"
import "regexp"

truenas_drives = ["S1ATNSAD906882M", "S21TNXAG607043P", "18231CC4B59F", "18471F7DF9F3"]
truenas_backup_drives = ["BTHV701404A4200MGN"]


from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d: 1m, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /^scale\.truenas\.smart_log_smart\.disktemp\..*/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with _field: regexp.findString(r: /[^\.]+$/, v: r._measurement)
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["_field"], set: truenas_drives) or contains(value: r["_field"], set: truenas_backup_drives))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "regexp"

truenas_tank_drives = ["9JG4DJKT", "9JGK57NT", "9JH16J8T", "9JG2UX4G", "9JH158RT"]
truenas_boot_pool_drives = ["S21TNXAG607043P", "S1ATNSAD906882M"]
truenas_backup_tank_drives = ["ZX20SPDB", "ZX213EF4"]
truenas_backup_boot_pool_drives = ["BTHV701404A4200MGN"]

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /^scale\.truenas\.truenas_disk_stats\._serial_lunid_[^\.]+\.reads$/ or r["_measurement"] =~ /^scale\.truenas\.truenas_disk_stats\._serial_lunid_[^\.]+\.writes$/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with _field: regexp.findString(r: /[^\.]+\.[^\.]+$/, v: r._measurement)
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with _drive: regexp.findString(r: /[^_]+$/, v: regexp.findString(r: /^_serial_lunid_[^_]+/, v: r._field))
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    ("$host" == "truenas" and "$pool" == "tank" and contains(value: r["_drive"], set: truenas_tank_drives))
    or ("$host" == "truenas" and "$pool" == "boot-pool" and contains(value: r["_drive"], set: truenas_boot_pool_drives))
    or ("$host" == "truenas-backup" and "$pool" == "tank" and contains(value: r["_drive"], set: truenas_backup_tank_drives))
    or ("$host" == "truenas-backup" and "$pool" == "boot-pool" and contains(value: r["_drive"], set: truenas_backup_boot_pool_drives)))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with _value:
      if (regexp.findString(r: /[^\.]+$/, v: r._field) == "reads") then -r._value
      else r._value
  }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket_long_term}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "$host")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "size" or r["_field"] == "alloc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${pool}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(
        fn: (r) => ({
            _time: r._time,
            _measurement: r._measurement,
            _field: "pool_used_percent",
            _value: float(v: r.alloc) / float(v: r.size) * 100.0
        }),
    )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")
list.label: Host
list.name: host

query.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")

list.definition:
import "strings"
  
  from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /^scale\.truenas\.net\..+\.received$/ )
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with _measurement: strings.split(v: r._measurement, t: ".")[3]
    }))
    |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["_measurement"])
    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["_measurement"])
    |> distinct(column: "_measurement")
list.label: Interface
list.name: interface

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")

list.definition:
import "strings"
  
  from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${pool}")
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["name"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])
  |> distinct(column: "name")
  |> map(
    fn: (r) => ({
      r with _value: strings.title(v: r._value)
    })
  )
list.label: Pool Title
list.name: pool_title
